resources.string: Blood sugar levels should be between 70-130 mg/dL before a meal and up to 180 mg/dL after

This app is used to help users keep track of important health information.

 You will enter daily food intake, blood sugar levels, and insulin injections.

 The app will inform you and your doctor if you are not receiving the correct amounts.
This will clear ALL previously saved data from your device. It cannot be recovered.\n\n Are you sure?
Your blood sugar is high, please go see a doctor.
Your blood sugar is low, please go see a doctor.
Your %1$s consumption is %2$s, your doctor has been notified.
